latest_revision.text:
The operations team is a committee recruited by the board in order to manage the day-to-day operations of HeatSync Labs.

== Station Heads ==

*'''[[:Category:Facilities | Facilities]]''': Nate Caine
*'''[[3D_Printers | 3D Printing]]''': Antonio Contrisciani, Cpro
*'''[[AudioVisual | Audio/Video]]''': Rick Blake
*'''[[Biochem Lab]]''': Shaundra Newstead, Greg Oswalt
*'''[[Electronics]]''': David Flores, Nate Caine
*'''[[Jewelry]]''': Sarah McCann
*'''[[Laser Cutters]]''': David Flores (certification classes), Nate Caine (laser maintenance)
*'''[[Machine Shop]]''': Darrell Wertz
*'''Microcontrollers''': David Flores
*'''Nuts & Bolts''': Greg Oswalt
*'''[[Sewing]]''': Michelle Mueller, Linda Brett
*'''[[Vinyl_Cutter | Vinyl Cutter]]''': Needed
*'''[[Welding]]''': Shaundra Newstead, Eric Wood
*'''[[WoodShop | Wood Shop]]''': Needed, Shaundra Newstead and Darrel Wertz (temporary)

== IT ==

* Server/website/email/wiki/docs design/implementation/support/management (also see: [[Web_Presence]])
* Web development and design (with marketing help)
* eCommerce (with treasurer account)
* Online account management (passwords, integration)
* Computer/hardware design/implementation/management/support
* Network support
* Webcams, twitter bots, etc
* Physical security (with resource manager)
* Public notification of outages/downtime
* Technological recommendations/reviews/ordering (with resource manager and treasurer)
* Technical training
